ygData.subject: Re: Thanks
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For the Soundblaster 16 .. I m not sure why that wouldn t work, offhand :( That s the soundcard that I was using until just recently, and never had any
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 37
Message-ID: <17248.37.105.959279670@...>
Date: Mon, 31 May 1999 04:56:14 -0400
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Re: Thanks


>I finally got it to work by deleting the files and starting over. I still 
>cannot play with sound though. I have a soundblaster16 soundcard so I 
>don't understand why that's not working. Also I have windows 98. Is there 
>anyway to create a shortcut from windows to start the game? I appreciate 
>all the helpful sugeestions from everyone. Thanks....

For the Soundblaster 16 .. I'm not sure why that wouldn't work, offhand :( 
That's the soundcard that I was using until just recently, and never had 
any problems with it. Do you know if your card is set to use "non-standard" 
settings or anything? Or does anyone else have ideas?

To create a shortcut for the game -- just make a shortcut that points to 
the "Glad.exe" program in the Gladiator folder. It doesn't have an icon, so 
it'll look like a blue "DOS" icon unless you pick another icon for it.

--Tom
